content.rendered:
Directed by Siva.

Written by Siva. Siva. Gautam Siddharth. Mayank Jain.

Cast Ajith Kumar(Ajay Kumar / AK). Vivek Oberoi(Aryan Singha (as Vivek Anand Oberoi)). Kajal Aggarwal(Yazhini Ajay Kumar). Akshara Haasan(Natasha). Karunakaran(APS Arumai Prakasam (as Karunagaran)). Amila Terzimehic(Rachael). Serge Crozon-Cazin(Michael (as Serge Crozon Cazin)). Bashar Rahal(Terrorist). Aarav Choudhary(Shawn (as Arav Chowdry)). Billy Murali(CTS Officer). Branka Pujic(Doctor Lady). Anka Gacesa(Doctor Lady Ass.). Bojana Ordinacev(It Girl). Vojislav Tomic(It Guy). Katarina Gojkovic(Doctor Lady). Milos Timotijevic(Bad Guy 1). Radomir Petkovic(Bad Guy 2). Slobodan Stefanovic(Albanian Leader). Joakim Tasic(Hologram Boy). Hivzo Nezirovic(Aryan Driver). Milan Jovanovic Strongman(Strongman (as Milan Jovanovic)) . Slavisa Ivanovic(Military Officer in dam). Alexander Winters(Bandit). Jonas Dinal(French Spy 1 (uncredited)). Bobby Gerrits(Gangster (uncredited)). Abdou Sagna(French Spy 2 (uncredited))

Language Tamil.

Producers Alek Conic. KS Jairam. Milan Milisavljevic. Raahul. G. Saravanan. Arjun Thyagarajan. Sendhil Thyagarajan. T.G. Thyagarajan.

Production Sathya Jyothi Films. Goldmines Telefilms.
